titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jose M. Arvayo.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 7/29/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to two named individuals on behalf of their infant son in full settlement of all claims arising out of the failure of a physician of the U.S. Air Force to diagnose and treat an illness of such son.
